title: At the threshold of eternity
creator_credit: Colorado State University Production Company and Mikel Way
brief_description: Dr. James Enderson talks about the ways being used to save endangered or threatened wildlife. The following recovery plans: Habitat Management, Transplanting, and Captive Breeding, are shown in practice with wildlife in several areas of the United States.
creator_credit_for_label: Colorado State University Production Company and Mikel Way
